ivardefs.name: account_
ivardefs.desc: Account into which this ChargeItems belongs.

ivardefs.name: bodysite_
ivardefs.desc: The anatomical location where the related service has been applied.

ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: A code that identifies the charge, like a billing code.

ivardefs.name: context
ivardefs.desc: The encounter or episode of care that establishes the context for this event.

ivardefs.name: definition_
ivardefs.desc: References the source of pricing information, rules of application for the code this ChargeItem uses.

ivardefs.name: enteredDate
ivardefs.desc: Date the charge item was entered.

ivardefs.name: enterer
ivardefs.desc: The device, practitioner, etc. who entered the charge item.

ivardefs.name: factorOverride
ivardefs.desc: Factor overriding the factor determined by the rules associated with the code.

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: Identifiers assigned to this event performer or other systems.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Comments made about the event by the performer, subject or other participants.

ivardefs.name: overrideReason
ivardefs.desc: If the list price or the rule based factor associated with the code is overridden, this attribute can capture a text to indicate the  reason for this action.

ivardefs.name: participant_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates who or what performed or participated in the charged service.

ivardefs.name: partOf_
ivardefs.desc: ChargeItems can be grouped to larger ChargeItems covering the whole set.

ivardefs.name: performingOrganization
ivardefs.desc: The organization requesting the service.

ivardefs.name: priceOverride
ivardefs.desc: Total price of the charge overriding the list price associated with the code.

ivardefs.name: quantity
ivardefs.desc: Quantity of which the charge item has been serviced.

ivardefs.name: reason_
ivardefs.desc: Describes why the event occurred in coded or textual form.

ivardefs.name: requestingOrganization
ivardefs.desc: The organization performing the service.

ivardefs.name: service_
ivardefs.desc: Indicated the rendered service that caused this charge.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The current state of the ChargeItem.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The individual or set of individuals the action is being or was performed on.

ivardefs.name: supportingInformation_
ivardefs.desc: Further information supporting the this charge.
